group_1.textLeft: They're just bentos!@Are you for real?!
...I mean, seriously, who likes@to eat THAT much anyway?!

group_1.textRight: They mean so much to me!
This is like...a really big deal for me!

group_1.narration: Like I said before, nobody ever@notices me, so I'm always all alone...@I've got no friends.@...That's why I always hated lunch
and recess!@Everyone else has so much fun,
pushing their desks together...@But no one ever invites me...@Just the thought of sitting@all alone during lunch...@I hated it so much!@But all that changed one day...
The day I first ate@your special bento.@Somehow I was just lucky that day,
and the timing was perfect for me@to buy one of your bentos...@I had one bite and thought that@I'd never had such a delicious bento@in my entire life.
I was eating all alone in the corner@of the classroom like always, but I@just started smiling...
As long as I could eat a delicious@bento like that, I felt like I'd be able@to look forward to lunch.
I'm no good at running, but...@On the days that I ran to go@buy your bento...@The whole classroom felt different@to me somehow...
For the first time...@I felt like I was the same as@everyone else! I felt happy!

group_1.textRight: But now… Now that I finally found @something to enjoy about lunch…
What do I have to look forward@to during lunchtime now?
